title: Dream Archive Adventure #104
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Sleeping Chamber
rooms.description: You awaken in a dimly lit chamber with walls that pulse like breathing lungs. Soft blue light emanates from floating orbs that drift lazily through the air. A bed made of clouds sits in the center, and strange symbols glow on the floor. This is the entry point to the Dream Archive, where memories are stored and sorted.

items.name: bed of clouds
items.description: A soft, ethereal bed that seems to float slightly above the ground

items.name: silver dreamer token
items.description: A coin-shaped token with your face etched on one side

items.name: memory storage cabinet
items.description: A tall cabinet with three compartments, each labeled with a different emotion

items.name: archive guide scroll
items.description: A glowing scroll with instructions for navigating the Dream Archive
items.text: Welcome to Dream Archive #104. You are Dreamer 742. To escape, you must recover your Core Memory from the Awakening Chamber. The Archivist guards the way forward. Remember: You are Dreamer 742, your first dream was in the Garden of Beginnings, and your purpose is to Remember.

items.name: translucent crystal key
items.description: A key made of solidified dream essence that glows with inner light

items.name: locked dream chest
items.description: A chest sealed with a crystal lock mechanism

items.name: Memory Shard of Truth
items.description: A glowing fragment of your core memory, pulsing with recognition

items.name: floating light orbs
items.description: Glowing orbs that drift through the air, illuminating the chamber

items.name: floating note
items.description: A small note attached to one of the orbs
items.text: Reminder for Dreamer 742: Your archive number is your key to the fear compartment.

items.name: shimmering archway
items.description: An archway filled with rippling light, leading deeper into the archive

rooms.name: Hall of Echoes
rooms.description: A vast corridor where whispers of past dreams echo endlessly. The walls are lined with mirrors that show different versions of yourself from various dreams. Three large tapestries hang on the walls, each depicting a significant moment. At the far end, a door covered in questions blocks the path forward.

items.name: tapestry of first dreams
items.description: A woven image showing a beautiful garden filled with flowers
items.text: The First Dream: Every dreamer begins their journey in the Garden of Beginnings, where consciousness first learns to create.

items.name: tapestry of shadows
items.description: A dark tapestry showing twisted shapes and forgotten fears
items.text: The Shadow Dreams: In the Void of Forgetting, memories go to fade. This is where dreamers lose themselves.

items.name: tapestry of awakening
items.description: A bright tapestry showing a figure reaching toward light
items.text: The Purpose: All dreamers share one purpose - to Remember who they are and wake to reality.

items.name: wall of infinite mirrors
items.description: Countless mirrors showing different versions of yourself

items.name: note from your reflection
items.description: A message written in reverse that becomes clear in the mirror
items.text: You are Dreamer 742. Never forget this. The Archivist will test you. Know where you began, what you fear most, and why you are here.

items.name: central pedestal
items.description: A stone pedestal with a glowing indentation

items.name: Memory Shard of Hope
items.description: Another fragment of your core memory, warm and bright

items.name: floating echo wisps
items.description: Ghostly wisps that whisper fragments of forgotten dreams
items.text: The wisps whisper: 'Dreamer 742... Garden of Beginnings... Void of Forgetting... Remember... Remember...'

items.name: door of questions
items.description: A massive door inscribed with three questions. A plaque reads: 'The Archivist demands proof of identity.'

password_questions.question: What is your designation?
password_questions.hint: Check the archive guide and your token

password_questions.question: Where did your dreams begin?
password_questions.hint: The tapestry of first dreams shows this location

password_questions.question: What is your purpose?
password_questions.hint: The tapestry of awakening reveals the purpose of all dreamers

rooms.name: Awakening Chamber
rooms.description: You have reached the heart of the Dream Archive! A brilliant sphere of light hovers in the center of the room, containing your complete Core Memory. The walls shimmer with scenes from your entire life, both waking and dreaming. Two pedestals stand before the sphere, waiting for the memory shards you have collected. Beyond the sphere, a portal shows glimpses of the waking world.

items.name: sphere of core memory
items.description: A radiant sphere containing the essence of who you truly are
items.text: Your Core Memory pulses with recognition. Place both Memory Shards on the pedestals to reclaim your complete self and activate the portal home.

items.name: memory pedestals
items.description: Two crystalline pedestals with sockets for the Memory Shards

items.name: portal to waking
items.description: A swirling gateway showing the real world beyond the Dream Archive

rooms.name: Return to Consciousness
rooms.description: Your eyes flutter open. You are lying in your own bed, morning sunlight streaming through familiar windows. The Dream Archive fades like mist, but you remember everything. You have successfully navigated Archive #104 and returned with your memories intact. You are awake. You are real. You are home.

items.name: warm sunlight
items.description: Real sunlight from the real world, warm and solid and true

rooms.win_message: You have successfully escaped Dream Archive #104! The Memory Shards merge back into your consciousness, and you wake with perfect clarity. You remember who you are, where you've been, and the journey through your own archived dreams. The adventure is complete. You win!
